Steinway.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a company that makes very good quality pianos, or a piano produced by this company. It has factories both in the US and Germany. The full name of the company is Steinway & Sons.
Steinway.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a type of expensive piano of very good quality, made by a company that was established in New York by Henry Steinway in the 19th century
Steinway.translation[1].definitions[0].e: In the centre of the room was a lovely old Steinway.
